data.description: Have you ever received a call that sends shivers down your spine? In this chilling Japanese urban legend, a discarded doll named Mary-san begins calling, each time getting closer and closer to her victim's home. What starts as an eerie phone call quickly escalates into a terrifying invasion of the safest place you know. Can you imagine the horror of being hunted within your own walls, the unseen presence drawing nearer with every ring? This tale of relentless pursuit and psychological dread explores the fear of having your sanctuary violated. Dive into the world of Japanese horror, where the supernatural lurks in the most mundane objects and the line between reality and nightmare blur. Would you answer a call from the unknown, or let it go straight to voicemail? #JapaneseHorror #UrbanLegend #Creepy #Supernatural #PsychologicalThriller #Haunted

data.vrew_script:
A dusty old doll
Discarded in a forgotten box
Then the phone rang a shrill sound
I am Mary-san I am near your house
My blood ran cold a creeping fear
Minutes later it rang again
I am Mary-san I am at your gate now
The air grew heavy my heart pounded
A third call a whispered threat
I am Mary-san I am climbing your stairs
Footsteps echoed from above
Silence fell then a soft knock
On my bedroom door just a whisper
I am Mary-san I am right here with you
